file.title: AMM PART II-1285 - CHAPTER 05-20-21-06 - CENTER FUSELAGE II - PASSENGER CABIN BOTTOM - EXTERNAL - INSPECTION/CHECK

page.data: AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL CENTER FUSELAGE II - PASSENGER CABIN BOTTOM - EXTERNAL - INSPECTION/CHECK EFFECTIVITY: ALL 1. General A. This section gives the procedures to do the visual inspection of center fuselage II - passenger cabin bottom for general condition. B. Related Zones: 141/142. C. (Applicable to EMB-145 (ALL) models) Zone Boundaries: STA X = 7131.0 thru STA X = 11990.0. (Applicable to EMB-135 (ALL) models) Zone Boundaries: STA X = 7131.0 thru STA X = 9984.0. (Applicable to EMB-135 (Recessed Floor) models) Zone Boundaries: STA X = 7131.0 thru STA X = 9984.0. D. The procedures in this section are given in the sequence below. The tasks identified with ( ♦) are part of the Scheduled Maintenance Requirements Document (SMRD). TASK NUMBER DESCRIPTION EFFECTIVITY CENTER FUSELAGE II - PASSENGER ALL 05-20-21-200-801-A ♦ CABIN BOTTOM - EXTERNAL GENERAL VISUAL INSPECTION EMB-145 - AMM 1285 General 05-20-21 Page 1 of 7 Rev 48 - Oct 30/15 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.

AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL TASK 05-20-21-200-801-A EFFECTIVITY: ALL 2. CENTER FUSELAGE II - PASSENGER CABIN BOTTOM - EXTERNAL GENERAL VISUAL INSPECTION A. General (1) This task gives instructions to do SMRD Zonal Task 53-Z141-213-001-A00. (2) You must do the external general visual inspection (GVI) of center fuselage II, at zones 141/142, within a touching distance of the items examined. (3) The function of the external general visual inspection (GVI) is to find damage, failure, or irregular conditions that can be easily seen. B. References REFERENCE DESIGNATION AMM TASK 12-22-00-600-801-A/300 LIGHT DIRT - SERVICING AMM TASK 12-22-00-600-802-A/300 HEAVY DIRT - SERVICING AMM TASK 12-23-00-600-801-A/300 - C. Zones and Accesses Not Applicable D. Tools and Equipment ITEM DESCRIPTION PURPOSE QTY Standard Ladder To get access to the inspection area To open the access panels to get access to Standard Screwdriver the inspection area E. Auxiliary Items Not Applicable F. Consumable Materials Not Applicable G. Expandable Parts Not Applicable H. Persons Recommended QTY FUNCTION PLACE Center fuselage II - passenger cabin bot- 1 Does the task tom I. Preparation SUBTASK 841-002-A (1) Put the ladder in position. EMB-145 - AMM 1285 200-801-A/600 05-20-21 Page 2 of 7 Rev 48 - Oct 30/15 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.

AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL (2) If necessary, clean the inspection area (AMM TASK 12-22-00-600-801-A/300) or (AMM TASK 12-22-00-600-802-A/300) as applicable. J. External General Visual Inspection (Figure 601) (Figure 602) (Figure 603) SUBTASK 212-002-A (1) Examine the fuselage zone for painting bad condition, loose rivets, nicks, skin deformation, sealant condition, warps, scratches, gouges, creases, cracks, dents, erosion, corrosion, and deteriorated protective treatment. (2) Examine the fuselage skin panel at stringers and frames/bulkheads, and splices for loose rivets, nicks, cracks, dents, warps, erosion, corrosion, and deteriorated protective treatment (Figure 603). (3) Examine the fuselage skin longitudinal and circumferential splices for loose rivets, nicks, cracks, dents, erosion, corrosion, and deteriorated protective treatment (Figure 603). (4) Examine the antennas for general condition and aerodynamic sealing. (5) NOTE: The access panels and doors referred to in step (5) will be examined externally only. Examine the access panels and doors below (Figure 601) and (Figure 602) for general condition and loose/missing screws: • 191CL • 191HL • 191KL • 191ML • 191EL • 191GL • 191AR • 191BR • 191DR • 191JR • 191LR • 191NR • 191FR (6) Examine drains for signs of corrosion. Also do a check for blockage and correct operation (AMM TASK 12-23-00-600-801-A/300). EMB-145 - AMM 1285 200-801-A/600 05-20-21 Page 3 of 7 Rev 48 - Oct 30/15 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.

AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL K. Follow-on SUBTASK 842-002-A (1) Remove the ladder. EMB-145 - AMM 1285 200-801-A/600 05-20-21 Page 4 of 7 Rev 48 - Oct 30/15 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.
